7.ara-name: كتاب الزكاة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Mas'ud narrated that :the Prophet said: "A Tabi or a Tabi'ah (is due) on thirty cows, and a Musinnah (is due) on every forty

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي زَكَاةِ الْبَقَرِ .
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Zakat On Cows
